snippet: Mr. Goldstein was a tummler, hired to amuse hotel guests with songs and shtick; few people could defeat him at Simon Says.
abstract: Lou Goldstein, consummate tummler who amused guests at Grossinger's hotel in the Catskills from 1948 until it closed, dies at age 90.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Goldstein was a tummler, hired to amuse hotel guests with songs and shtick; few people could defeat him at Simon Says.

headline.seo: Lou Goldstein, Borscht Belt Comedian, Dies at 90
headline.main: Lou Goldstein, Borscht Belt Master of Simon Says, Dies at 90
